name: Edge of Extinction - A RTS Game
name_original: Edge of Extinction - A RTS Game
description:
The Shrooms are on the  EDGE OF EXTINCTON!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to play:

If your FOOD REACHES 0, YOU LOSE !!!

Produce FOOD!

Produce MATERIAL to build more BUILDINGS  . 

Recommended buildings are marked with a

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Open the buildmenu with "B" or Click

Place buildings with LEFT CLICK

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Good luck, Shroomboss. You will need it!

---------------------------------------------

Try to survive as long as possible! This is a real time strategy and survival game made for the VimJam2.

The Edge of Extinction was created by 

Sebastian Schulte (Programmer) (Artwork)

---------------------------------------------

All code, art, sounds and music are self-made for the VimJam2 :)
